styles: .choosy-jerk-animation,#choosy-frame.jerk,:host>div.jerk{animation-name:jerk;animation-duration:0.2s;animation-iteration-count:1;animation-direction:normal;animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(0.5, 0, 0, 1.25);animation-fill-mode:forwards;animation-delay:0;transition:opacity 0.15s ease-out}@keyframes jerk{0%{transform:scale(0.9) translateY(-21px);opacity:0}100%{transform:scale(1) translateY(0);opacity:1}}.scrollbar,:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper{overflow-x:auto;position:relative}.scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar,:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper::-webkit-scrollbar{width:7px}.scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar-track,:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper::-webkit-scrollbar-track{-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0 0 2px #cad8d8}.scrollbar::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb,:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background-color:#dadfe9;outline:1px solid #2dd80e}.scrollbar:hover::-webkit-scrollbar,:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper:hover::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px}#choosy-frame,:host>div{border:1px solid #dadfe9;border-radius:3px;background-color:#fff;margin-top:3px;box-shadow:0px 17px 10px -10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);padding:10px;overflow:hidden;position:absolute;width:100%;z-index:9;left:0;top:100%}:host /deep/ .choosy-search-wrapper{display:flex;align-items:center;padding-bottom:10px}:host /deep/ .choosy-search-wrapper input.choosy-search-input{border-radius:3px;border:1px solid #dadfe9;background:transparent;padding:5px 8px;flex:1;font-family:inherit;font-size:inherit;outline:none}:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper{overflow-x:auto;position:relative;padding:0 3px}:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper .choosy-list-item{padding:7px 10px;cursor:pointer;text-align:left;border-radius:3px;outline:none;margin-bottom:2px}:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper .choosy-list-item:last-child{margin-bottom:0}:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper .choosy-list-item:hover,:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper .choosy-list-item:focus{background:#f6f8fa;outline:none}:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper .choosy-list-item.selected,:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper .choosy-list-item.selected:hover,:host /deep/ .choosy-list-wrapper .choosy-list-item.selected:focus{background:#00cbe2;color:#fff}:host /deep/ .choosy-footer-wrapper{text-align:center;padding-top:10px;margin-top:10px;border-top:1px solid rgba(218,223,233,0.7);font-size:80%;opacity:0.7}:host{display:block}
